div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1323 Priene, Ionia, 1870 (835) Burial: c. 158 B.C. (Newton) Contents: 6+ AR. In basis of cult statue Orophernes, Cappadocia: tetradr. Disposition: London 1; Paris 1; Berlin 1 Newton, NC 1871, pp. 19-27, illus. Regling, Priene, pp. 9, 45
